fr.gouv.vitam.tools.sedalib.inout.exporter

Class ArchiveTransferToDiskExporter

  • Object
    • ArchiveTransferToDiskExporter

  • public class ArchiveTransferToDiskExporter
extends Object
    The Class ArchiveTransferToDiskExporter.

    Class for ArchiveTransfer object export on disk hierarchy.

    It will export in the output directory:

    • GlobalMetadata XML fragments in the __GlobalMetadata.xml file
    • ManagementMetadata XML element at the end of DataObjectPackage in the __ManagementMetadata.xml file
    • each root ArchiveUnit as a sub directory, and recursively all the DataObjectPackage structure (see DataObjectPackageToDiskExporter for details)
    the export is compliant to Model V2-Extended model (DiskToArchiveTransferImporter

      • doExport

        public void doExport(String directoryName)
              throws SEDALibException,
                     InterruptedException
        Do export the ArchiveTransfer to a disk hierarchy.

        It will export in the output directory:

        • GlobalMetadata XML fragments in the __GlobalMetadata.xml file
        • ManagementMetadata XML element at the end of DataObjectPackage in the __ManagementMetadata.xml file
        • each root ArchiveUnit as a sub directory, and recursively all the DataObjectPackage structure
        Parameters:
        directoryName - the export directory name
        Throws:
        SEDALibException - if writing has failed
        InterruptedException - if export process is interrupted

      • getSummary

        public String getSummary()
        Gets the summary of the export process.
        Returns:
        the summary String
